title: Ubisoft is delaying Skull and Bones... Again - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.28.22
description:
Learn more about the NZXT Canvas Gaming Monitors at http://nzxt.co/KINDAFUNNY

Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Skull and Bones has been delayed again, big changes are coming to Overwatch 2, and Cyberpunk has sold 20 million copies. Blessing and Janet tackle it all on today's Games Daily.
